ygData.subject: Re: Rogues escape!/My other chars
ygData.msgSnippet: Jackie grimaces under his faceplate.  What a mess.  Quickly he sets to work, repairing enough of the damage to make sure Kenzo survives. ... suicide.

Jackie grimaces under his faceplate.  "What a mess."  Quickly he sets 
to work, repairing enough of the damage to make sure Kenzo survives.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CatMaster o" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> Waspinator converted to beast mode and flew away.
> 
> "As you command royalty, to the colony!" Inferno blasted off towards
> the predicon base as well.  
> 
> Kenzo layed criticaly damaged on the ground in stasis lock.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> > Devilcat realizes that staying any longer could be 
suicide.  "Rogues, 
> > fall back!  Return to base!"
> > 
> > Gatara abandons her prey reluctantly and takes to the air.  Noir 
> > quickly follows.  Riekan and Fury break away from their 
engagements 
> > and race after the others.  The five Rogues vanish into thin air 
as 
> > their cloaking devices go to work.
> > 
> > Wheeljack-X shakes his head, glad the battle is over.  Seeing 
Kenzo 
> > badly damaged, he forgets his own wounds and rushes over to help 
him.
> > 
> > Empath snarls and reverts to beast mode, prowling across the 
> > battlefield toward the base.
